meanings.definition: In a manner that forms a polygon.
meanings.sent1: The path twisted polygonally through the forest.
meanings.sent2: She walked polygonally around the square room.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel hopped polygonally from tree to tree, like a tiny acrobat.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved polygonally, connecting one idea to the next.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed polygonally, creating sharp angles in its course.

meanings.definition: Having the shape of a polygon.
meanings.sent1: The building had a polygonally designed roof.
meanings.sent2: The garden featured a polygonally shaped fountain.
meanings.sent3: The cake was cut into polygonally perfect slices, each one a tiny masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His face was a map of polygonally defined features.
meanings.sent5: The field was filled with polygonally arranged flowers, forming a colorful mosaic.
